title: Basic Architectural Design Workshop Utilizing Virtual Design Studios

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Architectural Terminology and Spatial Concept Comprehension
context.additional_context: A digital tool-based introductory architectural design course for beginner learners, applying culturally contextualized virtual design environments.

learning_goals: Learners can produce spatial layout diagrams using 3D modeling via the Virtual Design Studio (VDS) platform.
Learners can perform peer feedback processes at least three times using online collaboration tools and incorporate improvements.
Learners submit design proposals applying fundamental principles of architectural design (structural stability, functionality, aesthetic elements).

resources: VDS (Virtual Desktop Software) Dedicated Software License

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
